Message.Msg: Need somebody who gets it Need to know if anybody out there who gets involved in international financial purchases of historical instruments . Need serious knowledge and experience. More details will follow ASAP. Have to have access to acquisition people, and Brazilian bond procedures. Those interested should know that these items are not tradeable, will never be put into PPP, and should be viewed for what they are:if real, very valuable pieces of history. Anybody who is interested in that rare Rembrandt, old Indian nickle, Babe Ruth's last piece of chewing gum, 1926 Ford,mink that Betty Grable wore, old gem. etc will be intrigued by these, and place them some place safe to eventually go to grandchildren. Please advise ASAP Sender is NOT a United States Securities Dealer or Broker or U.S. Investment adviser. Sender is a Consultant and makes no warranties or representations as to the Buyer, Seller or Transaction. All due diligence is the responsibility of the Buyer . This E-mail letter and the attached related documents are never to be considered a solicitation for any purpose in any form or content. Upon receipt of these documents, the recipient hereby acknowledges this Disclaimer. If acknowledgment is not accepted, Recipient must return any and all documents in their original receipted condition to Sender.
